incoming.page_description: Share sensitive information securely with our support team
incoming.feature_disabled_description: This feature is currently disabled. Please contact support for assistance.
incoming.memo_hint: Help us route your message to the right person
incoming.recipient_aria_label: Select a recipient for this secret
incoming.recipient_hint: Choose who will receive this secure message
incoming.secret_content_placeholder: Paste sensitive information here (passwords, keys, etc.)
incoming.secret_content_hint: This information will be encrypted and only viewable once
incoming.success_description: Your secure message has been delivered.
incoming.success_info_description: The recipient will be able to view this secret only once. After they view it, the secret will be permanently deleted.
incoming.tagline2: Keep passwords and private data out of email and chat logs
incoming.end_of_experience_suggestion: Save your receipt for your records.
